type: Legendary Creature – Human Citizen Assassin Lord
rules_text:
Skulk, deathtouch
[i]Honorable Spirit[/i] – Whenever Yuri, Underground Lord attacks a player alone, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
[i]Leader of the Ashen Wolves – [/i]Whenever a black creature you control enters, surveil 2, then cloak the top card of your library.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {U}{B}
